# ion-avatar-group

#### Day 4

Demonstrates how to create a "pull apart" effect, commonly used with grouping multiple user avatars together. This design has been used in popular design apps such as InvisionApp.

You can slot anything into this component to see the effect in action.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `animated` | `animated` | `true` if the avatar elements will animate apart. | `boolean` | `true`  |
